alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Fulton; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 11:55AM CDT until March 31 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MARION...NORTHWESTERN FULTON AND NORTHERN BAXTER COUNTIES... At 1155 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bull Shoals State Park, or over Bull Shoals, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Gassville... Flippin... Lakeview in Baxter County... Arkawana... Ott... Ozark Regional Airport... Gamaliel Landing... Fawn Park... Bull Shoals State Park... Colfax... Cotter... Summit... Midway in Baxter County... Fairview in Marion County... Vidette... Clarkridge... Gamaliel... Three Brothers... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
